info.name: Procedural water texture
info.description:
A simple procedural texture, based on [url=https://www.shadertoy.com/view/tdsBRf]this shader[/url].
This one isn't very good: I was trying to do a tileable caustic like [url=https://www.shadertoy.com/view/MdlXz8]this one[/url].

renderpass.name: Image
